name: tsunami
posdesc: your civilization is struck by a tusnami, wiping out 20% of your population
negdesc: away from the ocean, your civilization is spared from the tusnami

name: flood
posdesc: your civilization is flooded by the river, wiping out 20% of your population
negdesc: away from any river your civilization is spared from the flood

name: drought
posdesc: far from water, your civilization is struck by a drought, wiping out 20% of your population
negdesc: with plenty of water around, your civilization is spared from the drought

name: avalanche
posdesc: your mountain civilization is struck by an avalanche, which wipes out 10% of your population
negdesc: far away from any mountains, your civilization is safe from the avalanche

name: new technology
posdesc: a boat of scientists lands in your civilization, bringing with them new technology that increases your population by 20%
negdesc: a party of scientists traveling by boat cannot navigate to your civilization, so you miss out on their new technologies

name: drought-resistant seeds
posdesc: scientists in your civilization develop drought-resistant seeds, increasing your population by 20%
negdesc: your scientists are focused on more important developments than drought-resistant seeds

name: rich soil
posdesc: the fresh water in your civilization creates rich soil this year, growing your population by 20%
negdesc: without fresh water coming naturally to your civilization, your soil is pretty average

name: forest fire
posdesc: your civilization is hit by a forest fire, killing 10% of your population
negdesc: without a large number of trees, your civilization is spared from the forest fire

name: fish disease
posdesc: your fish population is struck by a disease that kills 10% of your population
negdesc: your civilization has no fish, and therefore avoids any fish disease

name: mine collapse
posdesc: one of your mines collapses, killing 5% of your population
negdesc: your civilization has no mines, and therefore no mine collapse

name: scurvy
posdesc: your civilians lack access to vitamin C (commonly found in oranges), and as a result scurvy kills 10% of your population
negdesc: the vitamin C in your civilization's oranges help your civilians avoid scurvy

name: animal labor
posdesc: this year, you use your horses or camels for labor, growing your population by 10%
negdesc: your civilization has no animals fit for labor

name: wool trade
posdesc: you trade wool with a neighboring civilization, leading to wealth that grows your population by 5%
negdesc: you have no wool to trade with neighboring civilizations

name: gold trade
posdesc: you trade gold with a neighboring civilization, leading to wealth that grows your population by 10%
negdesc: you have no gold to trade with neighboring civilizations

name: silk trade
posdesc: you trade silk with a neighboring civilization, leading to wealth that grows your population by 10%
negdesc: you have no silk to trade with neighboring civilizations

name: upgraded shelters
posdesc: you use your trees to upgrade your shelters, which grows your population by 20%
negdesc: you have no trees with which to upgrade your shelters

name: improved government
posdesc: your civilization improves its government, which leads to a 20% population growth

name: improved saniation
posdesc: your civilization improves its sanitation which leads to a 30% population growth

name: improved medicine
posdesc: your civilization improves its medicine, which leads to a 30% population growth

name: stampede
posdesc: your herd animals are startled and stampede in their panic, killing 5% of your population
negdesc: you have no herd animals to be startled

name: mad cow disease
posdesc: your cows are plagued by mad cow disease, killing 10% of your population
negdesc: you have no cows, and therefore are immune to mad cow disease

name: tainted chicken
posdesc: your civilians eat chicken that has gone bad, killing 5% of your population
negdesc: you have no chickens, and therefore no tainted chicken

name: rabid dogs
posdesc: your dogs contract rabies, killing 10% of your population
negdesc: you have no dogs, and therefore avoid this outbreak of rabies

name: tainted fish
posdesc: your civilians eat fish that has gone bad, killing 5% of your population
negdesc: you have no fish, and therefore no tainted fish

name: jealous neighbors
posdesc: a neighboring civilization tries to steal your gold, killing 5% of your population
negdesc: you have no gold, and as a result your neighbors are uninterested

name: smallpox
posdesc: there's a smallpox outbreak in your civilization, killing 20% of your population

name: yellow fever
posdesc: there's a yellow fever outbreak in your civilization, killing 15% of your population

name: tuberculosis
posdesc: there's a tuberculosis outbreak in your civilization, killing 10% of your population

name: measles
posdesc: there's a measles outbreak in your civilization, killing 5% of your population

name: baby camel
posdesc: one of your civilization's camels has given birth - you now have another camel

name: new kitten
posdesc: one of your civilization's cats has given birth - you now have another cat

name: new chick
posdesc: one of your civilization's chickens has given birth - you now have another chicken

name: new calf
posdesc: one of your civilization's cows has given birth - you now have another cow

name: new puppy
posdesc: one of your civilization's dogs has given birth - you now have another dog

name: baby fish
posdesc: one of your civilization's fish has given birth - you now have another fish

name: new foal
posdesc: one of your civilization's horses has given birth - you now have another horse

name: baby llama
posdesc: one of your civilization's llamas has given birth - you now have another llama

posdesc: to show their respect, a neighboring civilization gives you a bean

posdesc: to show their respect, a neighboring civilization gives you corn

name: stone gift

negdesc: a neighboring civilization sends a thief to steal a bean, but he cannot find one
